verbose_text: Researchers have demonstrated that IRF4 may be a component of such a Th2 specific protein complex serving to enhance the function of nuclear factor of activated T cell-2 (NFATc2) via its physical interaction with NFATc2 at the IL-4 locus, indicating the important role of IRF4 in Th2 development.
evidence: Th2-specific protein complex serving to enhance the function of nuclear factor of activated T cell-2 (NFATc2) via its physical interaction with NFATc2 at the IL-4 locus, indicating the important role of IRF4
